FAMILY HOME ON THE NARR-MAEN RESERVE
Situated in a beautiful court location, and backing onto the Narr-Maen Reserve, this affordable family home with its gentle north-easterly orientation is a prize selection for any purchaser wishing to make a high-value acquisition. This property is situated in a tightly held court location, having had only 2 owners historically.
